page.title: 05The Seasons around Faversham
page.content:
{Sun}shines in the gardens {Primroses}shade under big trees {Right}for playing in the garden {In}the shade sun-bathing to {Night}time nears through the window {Ground}and grass and trees do grow
{Summer}time is here {Under}big trees it's so hot {Me}and my friends play in the garden {Met}at the summer spot {Eat}at the table in the garden {Race}you to the shady tree {Sarah Hughes {Summer}days bring happy days {Primroses}birds and hot summer days {Roses}ringing and daffodils singing {In the}garden bees are busy {Night}and day bring happy days {Gardens}so sweet and smelly {Lisa Jarrett}
